column5: I am traveling up to the south central part of lac seul the first week of june and was wondering on what the hot bait is for this time of the year for walleye and pike. Also where the walleye and pike are located in early june. thanks in advance for any info.
See the late May & Why lac Seul? posts on page 2. Same should apply for June, especially this year, sounds like ice is gonna go out a tad late.
I am staying at williams lake lodge which is connected to lac seul by a river. it is directly north of dryden.
